content.question: GDP is an imperfect measure of a nation’s economic performance because it does not account for which of the following?

choices.label: Purchases made by the nation’s government
Purchases of domestically produced goods by international consumers
Purchases of internationally produced goods by domestic consumers
Goods produced at home for personal consumption
Personal consumption expenditures on durable goods

content.answer: Goods produced at home for personal consumption
